desc: Ecoduka is UK's leading supplier of eco-friendly reusable products such as bags, face masks and coffee cups. Wholesale plain cotton bags, jute bags, drawstring bags and cosmetic pouches. Bulk Promotional bags, plain or printed bags in the UK. Ecoduka brings Maskari which offers one of the most advanced Face Mask.

layout.text: Bags made from 100% recycled plastic bottles
Our new range of eco-friendly recycled bags uses Recron® GreenGold fabric and are made from 100% used PET bottles.
